title: 02/08/2021 - HOUR 1 - Brady, Chiefs, Mahomes
itunes:title: 02/08/2021 - HOUR 1 - Brady, Chiefs, Mahomes
description:
Nick Wright filling in for Colin


Todd Bowels was the MVP of Super Bowl 55

Tom Brady is in a category that only has LeBron James as a member

No other QB would have done better for the Chiefs


Guest: Shannon Sharpe
